author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie What is the meaning of your silence? Did you get my remittance and my two letters or are you ill? I will ask you, if you are well, to attend to my letter at once as I cannot get beyond Saturday. You know what a state I get into when I have no letters and see my money running. Have been twice to the barrister today. He is drafting a reply to G.R. Remember I run ashore on Saturday evg. Jim
